details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.18 Annotation - 7.18.1 General - Alt in annotation
details.description: An annotation other than annotations of type Link, Widget or Popup whose hidden flag is not set and whose rectangle is not outside the crop-box and does not have a Contents key shall have an alternative description (in the form of an Alt entry in the enclosing structure element)

rule.description: An annotation other than annotations of type Link, Widget or Popup whose hidden flag is not set and whose rectangle is not outside the crop-box and does not have a Contents key shall have an alternative description (in the form of an Alt entry in the enclosing structure element)
rule.test: structParentType != 'Annot' || Subtype == 'Widget' || Subtype == 'Popup' || Subtype == 'Link' || isOutsideCropBox == true || (F & 2) == 2 || (Contents != null && Contents != '') || (Alt != null && Alt != '')

error.message: An annotation other than annotations of type Link, Widget or Popup whose hidden flag is not set and whose rectangle is not outside the crop-box and does not have a Contents key does not have an alternative description (in the form of an Alt entry in the enclosing structure element)
